title: Publish BharatSMM — Final Live Deployment

requirements.text: Publish and deploy the complete BharatSMM application (all frontend pages, admin dashboard, backend actor, and all previously implemented features) as the live production version.

quotes: लाइब कर दो सब कुछ हो गया

acceptanceCriteria: The app is deployed and accessible at its live URL.
All existing pages (Dashboard, New Order, Orders, Services, Add Funds, Profile, Admin Panel) are reachable and functional.
The Admin Panel is accessible only to the admin principal.
The dark navy/orange-red visual theme is consistently applied across all pages.
The sidebar renders the BharatSMM logo and all navigation links including the conditional Admin Panel entry.
The Add Funds page shows the UPI QR code and accepts deposits as low as ₹1.
Service price editing works from the Admin Panel's Service Prices tab.
All backend functions (orders, balances, top-up requests, admin operations) are live and operational.

constraints: Do not introduce any new features or UI changes — this is a clean publish of the current state.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui).
nonGoals: Adding new pages or features beyond what is already implemented.
Changing the visual theme or layout.
Modifying backend data models or adding new backend functions.
